ese sthuthiwantha wanuye mema siddhiyata adala saba pasubima mema garu sabhawatath, ratatath kiyapamata rajayata awasthawak labena heyini.wipaksha nayakathuma siya prakashaye nanga athi prashnayanta pilithuru dimata prathama ethumatath, mema garu sabhawatath mema udghoshanayata pasubima wu siddhin pilibanda wistharathmaka wigrahayak labadimata kamaththemi.mema prashnaya mulinma pananagune, 2013.07.16 wana dina rathupaswala helis aayathanaye, wenigos karmanthashalawa awata pradeshawasin wisin ema pradeshaye siduwi athayi kiyanu labana parisarika haniyak ha paniya jalaya apirisiduwima pilibanda pradeshiya sabha manthriwarayaku wetha karana lada mahajana paminili mathaya.me pilibanda niyojya amathi lasantha alagiyawanna mathithuma ha garu parlimenthu manthri pandu bandaranayaka mathithuma danuwathwu wahama me pilibanda aarthika sanwardhana garu amathya basil rajapaksha mathithuma ha gampaha disthrik lekamwaraya ha adala pradeshiya sabhawa ha madhyama parisara adhikariya athulu aayathana 08k danuwath kota mema prashnaya pilibanda pariksha kota wartha karana lesa upades dena ladi.in anathuruwa 2013.07.19 dina gampaha, nadungamuwa, anka 122 darana rohana wikramaaarachchi mahathage niwasedi adala saukhya waidya niladharin, pradeshiya sabha niladharin, jala sampadana mandalaye niladharin samanga ha awata pradeshawasin (200 kata adhika pirisak) niyojya amathya lasantha alagiyawanna mathithuma samanga sakachchawak pawathwana lada athara, ehidi me pilibanda danata karagena yana parikshana sambandhayenda pirisidu paniya jalaya janathawata sapayima sandaha ganu labana ketikalina ha digukalina piyawara sambandhayenda danuwath kirima karana ladi.
